arStrings.szText: {c_important}Sever{/c} damages enemies along its path for {c_number}[{SF_16} * 100|%|]{/c} of its initial damage.
{c_important}Sever{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for each Minion you have upon cast.
Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Sever{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_14}]{/c} seconds.
